title: 189: Adapt or Die- The Turning of the Fitness Tide
description: There is a change sweeping the fitness industry. It has been slowly building and this change has the been a major focus of the Mind Pump Revolution. It is the melding of fitness and wellness. Sal, Adam & Justin dive into the new era of fitness and necessity to embrace the new paradigm for health, performance & longevity. Please subscribe, rate and review this show! Learn more about Mind Pump at www.mindpumpradio.com
